title: Erin Molan shares rare photo of fiancé Sean Ogilvy at the beach with their daughter Eliza
text:
She's famously private when it comes to her relationship with fiancé Sean Ogilvy.

But on Saturday, Erin Molan shared a rare photo of Sean to her Instagram feed.

The Channel Nine sports reporter uploaded a sweet picture of the police officer holding their one-year-old daughter, Eliza.

Family time: Erin Molan shares rare photo of police officer fiancé Sean Ogilvy at the beach with their daughter Eliza (Pictured: March, 2016)

The seaside snap was taken from behind, concealing Sean's face from view.

Erin didn't share any other photos from their beach outing together, and simply captioned the one highly-edited sunset photo with prayer hand and world emojis.

The 36-year-old journalist's fiancé doesn't appear to have social media, and is rarely featured on Erin's accounts.

Special moment: The seaside snap was taken from behind, concealing Sean's face from view

Couple: She announced her engagement to fiance' Sean while hosting the Footy Show in April 2018, and revealed she was expecting a child on the show in December 2018

Busy mama: Erin and her Sean welcomed Eliza in early June 2018, with Erin returning to work just six weeks after giving birth

Erin and her Sean welcomed Eliza in early June 2018, with Erin returning to work just six weeks after giving birth.

She announced her engagement to fiance' Sean while hosting the Footy Show in April 2018, and revealed she was expecting a child on the show in December 2018.

Meanwhile, Erin has been in the middle of an alleged feud with former co-host Andrew Johns.

In recent months, reports have emerged claiming Andrew disliked working with Erin and quit The Footy Show because he didn't want her being the main presenter.

The rumoured feud between Andrew Johns (pictured) and Molan dominated headlines after the Immortal is said to have told Nine staff he found her difficult to work with

Last year, Erin was also blamed for the downfall of The NRL Footy Show after it was axed in October - despite the fact its ratings had been sliding for years.

Erin replaced longtime Footy Show host Paul 'Fatty' Vautin earlier in 2018 as the network launched a rebrand in an attempt to improve ratings.

Ultimately, the program couldn't be salvaged and the show was cancelled after 25 years on air.
description: She's famously private when it comes to her relationship with fiancé Sean Ogilvy. But on Saturday, Erin Molan shared a rare photo of Sean to her Instagram feed.
authors: Candice Jackson For Daily Mail Australia
